intro: Phanera hypoglauca, commonly known as the golden shower tree, is a tropical plant belonging to the family Bignoniaceae. It is characterized by its striking, pendulous clusters of yellow flowers that bloom in the spring. The plant has compound leaves composed of several oval-shaped leaflets. Phanera hypoglauca is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is used in landscaping in tropical and subtropical regions.
